page.title: 14Banwell Caves and Monument
page.content: The bones in the cave are of prehistoric animals. These include the huge cave bear, cave lion, reindeer, wolf, hyaena,bison, mammoth and woolly rhinoceros. The actual house was built for {Bishop Law,}and had a fully landscaped garden with many grottos and a lot of parkland. The house was the Bishop's summer palace, and Bishop Law tower on top of Banwell Hill was used to call the bishop back to Wells in an emergency. The tower can only be seen in the winter because the trees have grown all around it. From the top of the tower you can see both north and south, as far as Wales to the north and the Somerset levels to the south.
